meanings.definition: To tilt upward or raise up.
meanings.sent1: She was uptilting her head to look at the stars.
meanings.sent2: The construction worker was uptilting the ladder to reach the higher shelf.
meanings.sent3: The cat was uptilting its tail in excitement.
meanings.sent4: The flowers in the garden were uptilting towards the sun.
meanings.sent5: The kite was uptilting in the strong wind, soaring high in the sky.

meanings.sent1: The uptilting of the painting on the wall caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The uptilting of the hill made it a challenging hike.
meanings.sent3: The uptilting of the cake on the plate made it look like a leaning tower.
meanings.sent4: The uptilting of the ship's deck in the storm caused chaos among the crew.
meanings.sent5: The uptilting of the tree branches created a beautiful canopy of leaves.
